entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a powerful Dark wizard who killed Harry's parents and was defeated by Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, a young boy who survived a curse from Voldemort and has a lightning-shaped scar on his forehead.

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: Harry's cruel and neglectful Muggle relatives who took him in after his parents' death.

relationships.description: Voldemort was defeated by Harry, as the curse he cast on Harry rebounded back to him.
There is no direct relationship between Voldemort and the Dursleys mentioned in this text.
